<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<div class="detail-page-description content-block js-detail-page-description gl-pb-0 gl-border-none">
<div><div><div class="title-container"><h1 data-qa-selector="title_content" dir="auto" class="title gl-font-size-h-display">Add documentation on using Flash alerts in dialog components</h1> <button title="Edit title and description" aria-label="Edit title and description" type="button" class="btn btn-edit js-issuable-edit btn-default btn-md gl-button btn-icon"><!----> <svg data-testid="pencil-icon" role="img" aria-hidden="true" class="gl-button-icon gl-icon s16"><use href="/assets/icons-ce4e8ebe16c824ec266af5c86cfa08b0d35e88b4fa857e862dd87bbc726986bc.svg#pencil"></use></svg>  <!----></button></div> <div><!----></div> <!----> <div class="description js-task-list-container is-task-list-enabled" updated-at="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00"><div data-testid="gfm-content" class="md"><p data-sourcepos="1:1-2:101" dir="auto">I came across this usage of a Flash alert inside of a <code>details-dialog</code> that felt a bit off:
<a class="no-attachment-icon gfm" href="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" rel="noopener noreferrer" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" data-link="true" target="_blank"><img src="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" alt="image" decoding="async" class="gfm js-lazy-loaded" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" loading="lazy" data-qa_selector="js_lazy_loaded_content"></a></p>
<p data-sourcepos="4:1-4:263" dir="auto">Should we add some documentation about whether or not Flash alerts should be used inside of dialog components? To me it feels a bit redundant since the dialog itself is sort of like an alert but I wasn't 100% sure if this is something we should discourage or not.</p></div> <textarea data-update-url="/primer/design/-/issues/104.json" dir="auto" data-testid="textarea" class="hidden js-task-list-field"></textarea> <!----> <!----></div> <small class="edited-text js-issue-widgets">Edited <time title="Jan 3, 2024 1:47am PST" datetime="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00" class="">3 minutes ago</time></small></div></div>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<div class="detail-page-description content-block js-detail-page-description gl-pb-0 gl-border-none">
<div><div><div class="title-container"><h1 data-qa-selector="title_content" dir="auto" class="title gl-font-size-h-display">Add documentation on using Flash alerts in dialog components</h1> <button title="Edit title and description" aria-label="Edit title and description" type="button" class="btn btn-edit js-issuable-edit btn-default btn-md gl-button btn-icon"><!----> <svg data-testid="pencil-icon" role="img" aria-hidden="true" class="gl-button-icon gl-icon s16"><use href="/assets/icons-ce4e8ebe16c824ec266af5c86cfa08b0d35e88b4fa857e862dd87bbc726986bc.svg#pencil"></use></svg>  <!----></button></div> <div><!----></div> <!----> <div class="description js-task-list-container is-task-list-enabled" updated-at="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00"><div data-testid="gfm-content" class="md"><p data-sourcepos="1:1-2:101" dir="auto">I came across this usage of a Flash alert inside of a <code>details-dialog</code> that felt a bit off:
<a class="no-attachment-icon gfm" href="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" rel="noopener noreferrer" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" data-link="true" target="_blank"><img src="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" alt="image" decoding="async" class="gfm js-lazy-loaded" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" loading="lazy" data-qa_selector="js_lazy_loaded_content"></a></p>
<p data-sourcepos="4:1-4:263" dir="auto">Should we add some documentation about whether or not Flash alerts should be used inside of dialog components? To me it feels a bit redundant since the dialog itself is sort of like an alert but I wasn't 100% sure if this is something we should discourage or not.</p></div> <textarea data-update-url="/primer/design/-/issues/104.json" dir="auto" data-testid="textarea" class="hidden js-task-list-field"></textarea> <!----> <!----></div> <small class="edited-text js-issue-widgets">Edited <time title="Jan 3, 2024 1:47am PST" datetime="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00" class="">3 minutes ago</time> by <a href="/byteblaze" class="author-link gl-hover-text-decoration-underline"><span>Byte Blaze</span></a></small></div></div>

<p dir="auto" data-sourcepos="3:1-3:234">Can't find the issue/PR, but there was a case recently where a user could do different actions inside the modal and it needed some sort of waning/error message. So maybe in that case it's fine to use a flash alert? The guide could be:</p>
<blockquote dir="auto" data-sourcepos="5:1-5:66">
<p data-sourcepos="5:3-5:66">Only use a flash alert in modals in response to an action taken.</p>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

<div class="detail-page-description content-block js-detail-page-description gl-pb-0 gl-border-none">
<div><div><div class="title-container"><h1 data-qa-selector="title_content" dir="auto" class="title gl-font-size-h-display">Add documentation on using Flash alerts in dialog components</h1> <button title="Edit title and description" aria-label="Edit title and description" type="button" class="btn btn-edit js-issuable-edit btn-default btn-md gl-button btn-icon"><!----> <svg data-testid="pencil-icon" role="img" aria-hidden="true" class="gl-button-icon gl-icon s16"><use href="/assets/icons-ce4e8ebe16c824ec266af5c86cfa08b0d35e88b4fa857e862dd87bbc726986bc.svg#pencil"></use></svg>  <!----></button></div> <div><!----></div> <!----> <div class="description js-task-list-container is-task-list-enabled" updated-at="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00"><div data-testid="gfm-content" class="md"><p data-sourcepos="1:1-2:101" dir="auto">I came across this usage of a Flash alert inside of a <code>details-dialog</code> that felt a bit off:
<a class="no-attachment-icon gfm" href="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" rel="noopener noreferrer" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" data-link="true" target="_blank"><img src="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" alt="image" decoding="async" class="gfm js-lazy-loaded" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" loading="lazy" data-qa_selector="js_lazy_loaded_content"></a></p>
<p data-sourcepos="4:1-4:263" dir="auto">Should we add some documentation about whether or not Flash alerts should be used inside of dialog components? To me it feels a bit redundant since the dialog itself is sort of like an alert but I wasn't 100% sure if this is something we should discourage or not.</p></div> <textarea data-update-url="/primer/design/-/issues/104.json" dir="auto" data-testid="textarea" class="hidden js-task-list-field"></textarea> <!----> <!----></div> <small class="edited-text js-issue-widgets">Edited <time title="Jan 3, 2024 1:47am PST" datetime="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00" class="">3 minutes ago</time> by <a href="/byteblaze" class="author-link gl-hover-text-decoration-underline"><span>Byte Blaze</span></a></small></div></div>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>

</script>

<div class="detail-page-description content-block js-detail-page-description gl-pb-0 gl-border-none">
<div><div><div class="title-container"><h1 data-qa-selector="title_content" dir="auto" class="title gl-font-size-h-display">Add documentation on using Flash alerts in dialog components</h1> <button title="Edit title and description" aria-label="Edit title and description" type="button" class="btn btn-edit js-issuable-edit btn-default btn-md gl-button btn-icon"><!----> <svg data-testid="pencil-icon" role="img" aria-hidden="true" class="gl-button-icon gl-icon s16"><use href="/assets/icons-ce4e8ebe16c824ec266af5c86cfa08b0d35e88b4fa857e862dd87bbc726986bc.svg#pencil"></use></svg>  <!----></button></div> <div><!----></div> <!----> <div class="description js-task-list-container is-task-list-enabled" updated-at="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00"><div data-testid="gfm-content" class="md"><p data-sourcepos="1:1-2:101" dir="auto">I came across this usage of a Flash alert inside of a <code>details-dialog</code> that felt a bit off:
<a class="no-attachment-icon gfm" href="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" rel="noopener noreferrer" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" data-link="true" target="_blank"><img src="/primer/design/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" alt="image" decoding="async" class="gfm js-lazy-loaded" data-canonical-src="/uploads/0c74cb5fe4b143839859c4abebf4f465/82503278-cbf3e580-9aad-11ea-8ecc-e3c98694f37d.png" loading="lazy" data-qa_selector="js_lazy_loaded_content"></a></p>
<p data-sourcepos="4:1-4:263" dir="auto">Should we add some documentation about whether or not Flash alerts should be used inside of dialog components? To me it feels a bit redundant since the dialog itself is sort of like an alert but I wasn't 100% sure if this is something we should discourage or not.</p></div> <textarea data-update-url="/primer/design/-/issues/104.json" dir="auto" data-testid="textarea" class="hidden js-task-list-field"></textarea> <!----> <!----></div> <small class="edited-text js-issue-widgets">Edited <time title="Jan 3, 2024 1:47am PST" datetime="2024-01-03T09:47:15+00:00" class="">3 minutes ago</time> by <a href="/byteblaze" class="author-link gl-hover-text-decoration-underline"><span>Byte Blaze</span></a></small></div></div>

<script>
//<![CDATA[
if ('loading' in HTMLImageElement.prototype) {
  document.querySelectorAll('img.lazy').forEach(img => {
    img.loading = 'lazy';
    let imgUrl = img.dataset.src;
    // Only adding width + height for avatars for now
    if (imgUrl.indexOf('/avatar/') > -1 && imgUrl.indexOf('?') === -1) {
      const targetWidth = img.getAttribute('width') || img.width;
      imgUrl += `?width=${targetWidth}`;
    }
    img.src = imgUrl;
    img.removeAttribute('data-src');
    img.classList.remove('lazy');
    img.classList.add('js-lazy-loaded');
    img.dataset.qa_selector = 'js_lazy_loaded_content';
  });
}

//]]>
</script>
